llothis.name: Saint Llothis the Pious
llothis.description: 'Toxic' boss. Main mechanics are Bolts (interrupted), Blast (blocked) and Gas (kited). When dealt with alone, summons imperfections

felms.name: Saint Felms the Bold
felms.description: 'Nightblade' boss. Main mechanics are Manifest (avoided) and Storm (kited). When dealt with alone, summons imperfections

olms.name: Saint Olms the Just
olms.description: Main boss of AS. Casts Steam on tank, has a kite mechanics (requires to set 8 DD positions). Terminals should be focused. Casts Trial by Fire on execute, which needs to be healed. Can be HM+1 or HM+2 - depends on how many bosses you skip before - they will fight alongside
